title: Jeff Brazier puts on a brave face as he hides his ring finger after admitting to marital problems
text:
Jeff Brazier put on a brave face on Wednesday as he was seen for the first time since admitting he is having marital problems with wife Kate Dwyer.

The presenter, 40, cracked a relaxed smile as he attended The Sol Bar launch in London, but hid his ring finger as he posed up.

Jeff looked dapper in a slate grey suit paired with a crisp blue unbuttoned shirt, making sure to conceal his hand in his left pocket.

Smile: Jeff Brazier put on a brave face on Wednesday as he was seen for the first time since admitting he is having marital problems with wife Kate Dwyer

Love: Jeff (right) and Kate tied the knot in Portugal in September last year

The star maintained his cheery demeanour as he joined friends for a drink, all the while concealing his left hand from view.

This marks the first time Jeff has been seen in public since his spokesman confirmed he and wife Kate - who he wed last year - had been having marital problems.

The Sun reported that worried fans had noticed that the couple, who tied the knot last year, had unfollowed one another on social media.

A spokesperson for TV presenter Jeff, 40, told MailOnline that the couple are still together, despite any problems they might be facing.

Hmm: The presenter, 40, cracked a relaxed smile as he attended The Sol Bar launch in London, but hid his ring finger as he posed up

Hidden: The star maintained his cheery demeanour as he joined friends for a drink, all the while concealing his left hand from view

Sad news: Jeff admitted to having marital problems with wife Kate after worried fans noticed they had 'unfollowed' each other on Instagram

A spokesperson MailOnline: 'There is categorically no split. However, they have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together'

He said: 'There is categorically no split between Jeff and Kate. We're slightly bewildered how the story has come about.

'However, they have had some difficulties but they are doing their utmost to work through them together and will continue to do so in private.'

The couple have not been pictured together since August, when Jeff shared pictures of them on a trip to Manchester with sons Bobby, 16, and Freddie, 15.

Troubles: The couple unfollowed one another on social media

The boys are from Jeff's romance with Jade Goody, who sadly passed away from cancer ten years ago, when she was just aged 27.

Jeff and Kate tied the knot in a romantic Portuguese cliff-top wedding ceremony in September last year.

They announced their engagement in October 2017, with the TV star revealing he had sweetly asked the approval of his sons with late reality TV star Jade Goody.

Speaking to HELLO! magazine, ahead of the wedding, Jeff gushed: 'I couldn't be happier. This isn't just any wedding, this is a really special one.'

Jeff proposed to his girlfriend of five years in Ibiza, after seeking permission from his children in October 2017.

Family: The couple bring up Bobby, 16, and Freddie, 15 together - Jeff's sons from his romance with Jade Goody, who sadly lost her battle with cancer ten years ago

Bond: Kate is very close to Bobby and Freddie who clearly love her very much

Jeff revealed: 'I told her I loved her, and had been thinking about this for a while. I pulled the box with the ring out from my back pocket and asked if she would marry me. It was a very special moment.'

Last June, Jeff told MailOnline that Kate was a wonderful stepmother to his boys.

He said: 'Kate has adjusted very well now to becoming a step mum and what it entails.

'And the sacrifices that have to be made in order to give the children what they need first and for most.

'We spend some lovely family time together as the four of us. I personally love it when Kate does things with the boys when I'm not around.'
description: Jeff Brazier put on a brave face on Wednesday as he was seen for the first time since admitting he is having marital problems with wife Kate Dwyer.
